H0.text: Who is featured on Puff Daddy's Can't Hold Me Down. Jay-Z

H1.text: Who is featured on Puff Daddy's Can't Hold Me Down. Lil' Kim

H2.text: Who is featured on Puff Daddy's Can't Hold Me Down. The Notorious B.I.G.

H3.text: Who is featured on Puff Daddy's Can't Hold Me Down. Mase

A4.text: Mase guest appeared on Combs' 1997 single 'Can't Nobody Hold Me Down', which peaked atop the Billboard Hot 100

A5.text: Mase's debut studio album, Harlem World (1997), spawned his third top ten single as a lead artist, 'Lookin' at Me' (featuring Combs)
